model

Class Receipt

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Receipt

  • public class Receipt
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a PDF receipt for the customer. It contains the addresses, duration and total costs of the booking.
    Author:
    D20018

    • Method Detail

      • getFileDirectory

        public java.lang.String getFileDirectory()
        This function gets the file path where the PDF should be saved. It asks the user for the directory and provides a default filename. The default filename consists of the tenant's name.
        Returns:
        path or null directory where the PDF should be saved or null if you choose the abort operation of the UI dialog

      • writePdf

        public void writePdf(Booking b)
        This function stores the data from the booking into the receipt's attributes. Provide all the necessary data for the receipt so that it can be printed afterwards. The data are getting already structured and categoriced for the PDF.
        Parameters:
        b - represents the booking data element which stores all the necessary data for the receipt

      • createPDF

        public void createPDF()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        Create the PDF file out of the earlier setted information. The file will be saved to the choosen directory with the choosen or default filename depending of the user's choice.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException

      • returnForInvoices

        public java.lang.Object[] returnForInvoices()
